name: The Legend of Pahlawan Jaya
description:
This game was one of the first games I ever made, made in Unity for a Coursera course with Michigan State University.

Pahlawan Jaya is fighting to save the kingdom of Malacca from the Portuguese invaders.

AWSD to move.

Spacebar to jump, Double-Jump while in air.

Collect Loot boxes and coins, and reach the golden Kiris in the end of the level.
